website_summaries.verdict: While you'll pay a bit more up front for this set, many satisfied customers are happy with its durability over time.
pros: A top pick for anyone seeking to add a bit of serenity to a room
This fully quilted coverlet is suitable for queen- or king-size beds
Available in choice of several gorgeous color patterns
cons: Some customers complain that this set runs a bit small, meaning that the quilt won't touch the floor as shown in photos

customer_reviews.title: I also have king sized down pillows and the shams fit great. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard king sized bed that isn't very high, and the quilt fit perfectly with my bedskirt. I also have king sized down pillows and the shams fit great. Very happy with this product, especially for the price. The grey is a bit darker than the photo, and the flower details are medium-dark blue, so plan on the colors being generally more pronounced. Overall, would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: This has become my favorite bedspread. I have had many over the last ...
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite bedspread. I have had many over the last couple years trying to find one that I liked and had the comfort and warm for a bedspread Finally found it.
customer_reviews.author: Joannie Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is Unravelling in Less than One Month of Use
customer_reviews.text: While it looked nice initially, in less than one month of use the stitching started to unravel. I have attached pictures to document this in two different areas. If the manufacturer will send me a replacement then I will take down this negative review. I do have another one in another color that is fine, so I believe that I got a defective item. They do look lovely on the beds except for the unravelling problem.
customer_reviews.author: Triskeliongirl

customer_reviews.title: I love the bedspread--very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love the bedspread--very pretty, not too heavy, nice quality--but it is definitely not big enough to be a bedspread, as it more of a comforter. I bought the king size bedspread for my queen size bed and still had to use a dust ruffle because the bedspread fell at least 6 inches from the floor. I'd be so much happier with the look if I hadn't had to use a dust ruffle.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I've purchased - 1st was used as cover for day bed - Pups are on it all the time - so it lasted quite a while - 3+ years - bought another - easy to wash - looks great - love the material - and good for Dogs to lay on - LOL -
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: so I was very pleased with the way it fit
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars, but I agree heartily with other people.. If you want it to cover the queen bed, buy the King size. I listened to others, and did just that, so I was very pleased with the way it fit, and that it was very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Burls

customer_reviews.title: Bedspread is a very nice weight for the money and it's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bedspread is a very nice weight for the money and it's beautiful. I ordered the king for my king bed and it fixed perfectly. has a nice drop all the way around the bed. It's the perfect weight for year round use. I am setting up my guest room and plan to buy another one for that room too.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: SO Pretty!!!! Better than the picture!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! If you are seeking a weighted blanket - this isn't it. I live in NY State and have cold winters and drafty house - but this plus my second layer blanket and my sheet will be enough for me! I have a Queen Bed and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Saraja

customer_reviews.title: Shams included a queen size- not king
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight, softness and look. I did not like the fact that it came in a Queen/ King size so it’s pretty short in the sides and the shams are for queen pillows so they do not expand across the bed. I had to add some king pillows with a neutral sham to make it look somewhat balanced. There should be an option to order king sized shams.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Dennington

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful material, pattern and quality of workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful material, pattern and quality of workmanship. I loved it but it definitely was not King size for my king bed. Fit mor like a coverlet. Kind of disappointed, actually a lot disappointed cause I finally found one I loved and it's a No Go, sorry😕
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hitchens

customer_reviews.title: Far from high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the guest room. I washed it twice and am already having to sew it. The stitching has unraveled in several places. I followed the laundering instructions. This does not constitute high quality in my opinion. I also had to buy a dust ruffle because it does not reach the floor on my queen size bed. I would not waste my money on this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Joan A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Hangs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Looks even better in person. It did not match the room I bought it for but was able to use in another room. It is a great quality. looks and feels wonderful. Def worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: wings10

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a King size set to allow it to reach the floor on my Queen size bed. It worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: King Bedspread
customer_reviews.text: This product said King bedspread on the package, but it doesn't quite come to the floor on the sides of the bed to fit a Queen size bed for which I ordered this product. It is too short on the sides (about 5 inches) so it doesn't quite look like the picture. On a King bed it would be more like a quilt than a bedspread. It is nice otherwise, very pretty and it is of good quality for the price so I am happy with this bedspread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pastel colors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in the beige/aqua blue. It just arrived and is very pastel in color and very pretty. I'm just warning anybody who buys it that it is NOT beige. It is ivory. There is not a bit of beige present. That's okay with me, but if you don't want something that is very close to white, then this is not for you. I purchased an Ivory throw for a chair in the same room and the throw that is sold as Ivory is darker in color than this which is being sold as beige.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S Golden

customer_reviews.title: Size too small. I have a queen size bed, but even the king size quilt doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy with the size. It reads King size, but even tho I don't have a high mattress, it doesn't fit the way it's supposed. to. The brown stripe should be sitting on the top on each side, but if I pull it to the right place, the other size rides up. The length is too short also. I don't have the bag that it came in, or I'd send it back. I would not buy it again because of it's small size. I only have a queen size bed, so a King size should have been much larger.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Monday

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and soft
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and feel of this quilt. It’s perfect for Florida year round. It would be good year round anywhere and it’s beautiful. The color is a bit more green than I expected but it’s still perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy & Inviting!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my bed look cozy and inviting and, yet, imposing. Easy to care for (I've washed it twice and looks great). Material is soft and nicely lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Halshep

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Fits my queen bed perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Fits my queen bed perfectly. Love it. It's a little more on the red side than burgundy but it matches my bedroom great.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Poor job!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. While it has a nice feel to it, the sewing was horrible, not complete. I don't think it is right that the customer has to pay return postage on an item when it is not their fault the item is of poor craftsmanship/poor quality job! Lot of places not completely sewn, then there is long strips of thread that are sewn haphazardly throughout hanging everywhere. The end binding is a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Denny Niccum

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this bedspread set
customer_reviews.text: This is the missus. I am very pleased with this bedspread set. We got the beige/taupe, and it looks like the picture, probably prettier. I wanted something fairly lightweight for summer. This fits the bill without being so light as to seem cheap. It is well made and held up to being washed and dried. It was not even wrinkled. The queen/king fits a queen size bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bedspread and pillow cover set. Actually, my wife picked it out. The most important thing (of course) is that she is pleased beyond compare. It is beautiful in our bedroom. We've had to wash it once. It came out of the washing as pretty as it was new. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.Top Contributor: Rock Music

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it's sueded .  Perfect in my guest room.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and the fabric is soft and perfect. The color is exactly as shown and I am very happy with this set. Arrived in 2 day, as promised and after fluffing in the dryer, went right on the bed. Great !
customer_reviews.author: Scooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Quilt Set
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is very pretty, lightweight and comfortable. I only gave it 4 stars because some of the stitching is off.
customer_reviews.author: ylisa7

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful!!! It fits the bed perfectly and the weight is just perfect for the summer evenings. I would recommend it!! I purchased the beige one. It gives just enough color to the bedroom. Nice and airy décor!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Brounty

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but color different than picture
customer_reviews.text: Soft, very pretty but unfortunately color is much lighter than pictured, too light for my purpose but I will keep for my guestroom. I purchased the beige/aqua and it was more like seafoam blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend very good proudct
customer_reviews.text: We have been using different colors in different bedrooms , no issues
customer_reviews.author: Chandu

customer_reviews.title: This quilt prompted my first Amazon review
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is the softest I've ever felt. Soft enough to use right out of the package! (And no chemical smell!) Two weeks later (today), I washed it but let it air dry to help maintain its quality and color. True to the photos presented on Amazon. Size is true to King sized bedding. Lighter weight than some other quilts I have owned but perfect for summer months. FYI, I like to tuck the end under so it doesn't slide off in the night. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only disappointment is that there are a lot of loose stitches and strings, expecting the beautiful stitching to be ruined shortly :(
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Looks great on my queenbed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!!! it did come with a stain on it but I was compensated. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Maria Neely

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! It is beautiful and add an elegant look to my bedroom. It is cooler than a comforter which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: TBear67

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The product met my expectations. The quality appears to be excellent. We washed the items before we put them on the bed and they came out of the wash looking great! The colors are very beautiful. I will buy from that company again. best wishes. Cuban Girl
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully, soft bedspread.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bedspread. It is so amazingly soft. Mostly what I was looking for. It is light weight, but perfect for me. I wanted something more for a bed cover than a blanket or quilt. However, there were a few problems. The description states beige for the background It is almost white. The teal is really more blue that the greenish blue that it appears in the picture. It also doesn't touch the floor as shown in the picture and I don't feel that my bed is especially high. Still, I'm keeping it because it is beautiful and will still work for my guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: It is a very beautiful and very good quality thanks
customer_reviews.author: Geri Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. It looks perfect on the bed. Only thing is I wish it dropped to the floor as shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: NICE SPREAD
customer_reviews.text: I really love this spread. It did not disappoint me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! Bought the Sage Green and Beige Quilted ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! Bought the Sage Green and Beige Quilted Set. Excellent quality and fit for a Queen Size Bed. Some who are using this King/Queen set did not like the King Size Pillow Shams, but I am using my old king sized pillows in the shams and bought some new king size pillows to sleep on. They look great! At this price, I will buy this set again when this one shows wear!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B

customer_reviews.title: Best deal ever!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material was fantastic the softness was unbelievable. It fit my bed and pillows perfect And it exceeded all of my Expectations it was truly a great deal and it arrives very fast I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This quilt is not wide enough--does not even fully drop to the bottom of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hamelton

customer_reviews.title: Great quilt!  Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Colors are not what I expected. But, it's a keeper. The solid color is grey (blue). The flowers are varying shades of blue/beige w/dark brown vines. Lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: It made our bedroom come to life ! Glenn and Agnes
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: This was a very nice quilt with beautiful quilting and a nice weight to ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice quilt with beautiful quilting and a nice weight to it. It looks great in our guest bedroom. I bought a king size for a queen bed because have a thick tempurpedic mattress.
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: Not king size
customer_reviews.text: Not a king size spread as advertised Might be a Queen.
customer_reviews.author: nananurse

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty on the bed.
customer_reviews.text: The only one thing that could be better is if the spread was wider so it reached the floor on both sides, as the ad photo showed it doing. Otherwise happy with everything else about it. Launders very well.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: No the color I expected. Was more baby blue than a greenish blue
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Love this Quilt
customer_reviews.text: Warm!! Love this quilt!!! Very nice. Makes my bedroom look very cozy and inviting. Not to mention how soft and pretty it is. I'm glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: book worm

customer_reviews.title: The texture and colors are very nice, but the photo is deceptive
customer_reviews.text: The texture and colors are very nice, but the photo is deceptive. I ordered the queen/king size for my queen size bed and it isn't long enough. I do like it well enough that I will use it with a dust ruffle.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McDonough

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price and a perfect fit for my queen platform bed with 12 inch mattress. colors were true to those displayed on-line. I would recommend this purchase to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: kregec01

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lovely bedspread. It is lighter than a quilt or comforter, which is just what I was looking for. It fits a Queen size bed with extra length and width. My only complaint is that the pillow shams are very large, even for a king size pillow. Nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Smc

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and soft and the color and design on it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and soft and the color and design on it is very pretty. I put it on a queen bed and it fits nicely with a bed skirt . I would not recommend it for a king size, as it just would not come down on each side far enough for me. It also washes and dries great.
customer_reviews.author: lar/jane

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful colors! I have a queen size and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and heavier than I expected. Wonderful colors! I have a queen size and I dont need the ruffle even though I have it. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: homescooling momma

customer_reviews.title: Sham size does not match quilt size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a king size and fully expected king size shams, but they came w standard size
customer_reviews.author: Helen Kulesa

customer_reviews.title: This queen/ king sized bedspread fits my queen bed perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: This queen/ king sized bedspread fits my queen bed perfectly. It's soft, doesn't wrinkle and is true to the color pictured. I bought a second one to have available while cleaning the other.
customer_reviews.author: R R Maier

customer_reviews.title: Just dry it  a little and lay it out to dry completely. Very warm in the winter with a blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, went to the laundromat because it was to large for my washer. Came out great. I dryed it a little. No bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Glenny

customer_reviews.title: green bedroom
customer_reviews.text: love this bedspread the queen size fit my bed and fall over the sides Look like a bedspread costing more .Make my bedroom look very pretty the green match the color in the room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returning was easy
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item as it was not a good choice for me
customer_reviews.author: Patrícia Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Yes, there are some loose threads, but overall really pretty and the oversized spread fits great on a queen size bed that sits on 4" bed risers.
customer_reviews.author: EWestfall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, soft and I really like the detail in the stitching, fits my king bed perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: The problem we have is that they show the spread covering down to almost the floor. That is not true, it is almost 8 inches from the floor on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: brightens up my room
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfiied with my quilted coverlet, it's exactly what I wanted. Brightens up my bedroom.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits my Queen bed Beautifully, Washes well, love this product, well worth the Money!

customer_reviews.title: Queen size Quilt 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great looking quilt. Fits the bed and stays in place.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Hard for me to judge as just received it yesterday & washed it today not even on the bed . Did up very nice I believe it will hold .

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but dull for my taste.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set but a little dull and boring for me. Didn't really want beige it brown in my bed. I returned them and ordered a grey pinched style comforter that goes great with my eggplant colored walls.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good but the color is very different than what is ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good but the color is very different than what is shown on the website. The burgandy was quite a bit lighter and almost a raspberry color.
customer_reviews.author: Sooz

customer_reviews.title: These quilts are great, good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These quilts are great, good quality for the price, fit nice, soft, easy to care for. Not top of the line but for the price you really cant complain.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quilt. Not to heavy. Great for the southern winters.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this! its very well made! lovely design and Looks very nice on my bed!

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to receive such a high quality item. I absolutely love it! I would recommend it to anyone. Great value, great product.

customer_reviews.title: i sent this back for a refund
customer_reviews.text: i was very unhappy with this product and i returned it just a couple of days after receiving it. how much longer will it take to receive my refund

customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. The only down side, the quilting has spots where it is not finished. But I've always wanted an embroidered bedspread. This one was reasonable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful embroidered bedspread, true to size, looks great.

customer_reviews.text: My opened it today to put on her bed, and it's to small and no pillow shams. I ordered the one for a king/queen bed, she has a queen bed.

customer_reviews.title: ... the gray and beige one and it is very nice. A good size no skimping on fabric and ...

customer_reviews.text: Like the colors but size was not quite true to be a queen. Did not go to the floor like my others.

customer_reviews.title: I will start by saying this truly is a beautiful bedspread.
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying this truly is a beautiful bedspread....it is very soft and surprisingly light-weight...the description said it was Beige/Burgandy, I would not agree with that, the background is more white than beige and the burgundy is more red. The description also read queen/king but when I received it the package was marked king..... I have a queen size bed and I really like the way it fits, the pillow shams are perfect for my bed, a tad bigger than what I had...I would give this a 5 star except the color was not as beige/burgundy as I wanted...BUT I am keeping it and will work around the color difference because it is a beautiful...
customer_reviews.author: luvn UK comedy

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: the pillowcases are not big enough for a king size pillow, it is not worth spending on this quilt, the quality of the material is very low

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous !
customer_reviews.text: Very, very nice! The picture doesn't do it justice. It's also velvety soft. I ordered a queen size to put on a king size bed because the bed has drawers underneath that I didn't want covered up. It looks great. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Just minor cons
customer_reviews.text: Just a bit too big for our queen size bed, and I expected it to be a little heavier. I looks nice though!!

customer_reviews.text: COLOR is exactly as pictured and it’s soft - love it- better than expected. Haven’t washed it yet. Hoping it washes nicely.

customer_reviews.title: If your bed is tall, get the Queen/king size if you have a queen size bed.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the bedspread Queen/king fit my queen bed perfectly. My bed is tall and it fit perfectly. Love everything about it.

customer_reviews.title: I love the softness and color
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness and color. I just wish the king was a little longer. It is a lot warmer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: t-bel
